skErrorMessages.core_error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry. If the issue persists, please contact support on THORSwap Discord
skErrorMessages.core_error_copy: Click the icon to copy the error details and include in your support ticket for better diagnosis.
skErrorMessages.core_wallet_connection_not_found: Wallet connection not found. Try reconnecting your wallet.
skErrorMessages.core_estimated_max_spendable_chain_not_s: Estimated max spendable is not supported for %{chain}.
skErrorMessages.core_extend_error: Internal Swapkit error - extending core with wallet failed
skErrorMessages.core_inbound_data_not_found: Inbound data not found. Try refreshing the page.
skErrorMessages.core_approve_asset_address_or_from_not_f: Approve asset address or from address not found. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_chain_halted: Chain is halted. Try again later.
skErrorMessages.core_wallet_xdefi_not_installed: XDEFI wallet is not installed. Please install XDEFI wallet and refresh the page.
skErrorMessages.core_wallet_evmwallet_not_installed: No EVM wallet detected. Please install/enable your EVM wallet and refresh the page.
skErrorMessages.core_wallet_walletconnect_not_installed: WalletConnect extension is not installed. Please install WalletConnect and refresh the page.
skErrorMessages.core_wallet_keplr_not_installed: Could not detect Keplr wallet. Please install Keplr wallet and refresh the page.
skErrorMessages.core_wallet_okx_not_installed: Could not detect OKX wallet. Please install OKX wallet and refresh the page.
skErrorMessages.core_swap_invalid_params: Invalid swap parameters. Try refreshing the page.
skErrorMessages.core_swap_route_not_complete: Swap route is not complete. Try refreshing the quote.
skErrorMessages.core_swap_asset_not_recognized: Asset not recognized. Try refreshing the quote.
skErrorMessages.core_swap_contract_not_found: Contract not found. Try refreshing the quote.
skErrorMessages.core_swap_route_transaction_not_found: Route transaction not found. Try refreshing the quote.
skErrorMessages.core_swap_contract_not_supported: Contract not supported. Try refreshing the quote.
skErrorMessages.core_swap_transaction_error: Transaction error. Try refreshing the quote or page.
skErrorMessages.core_swap_quote_mode_not_supported: Swap quote mode not supported. Try refreshing the quote.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_deposit_error: Deposit error. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_create_liquidity_rune_e: Create liquidity RUNE error. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_create_liquidity_asset_: Create liquidity %{asset} error. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_create_liquidity_invali: Create liquidity invalid parameters. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_add_liquidity_invalid_p: Add liquidity invalid parameters. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_add_liquidity_no_rune_a: Add liquidity error, no RUNE address. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_add_liquidity_rune_erro: Add liquidity RUNE error. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_add_liquidity_asset_err: Add liquidity %{asset} error. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_withdraw_error: Withdraw error. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_deposit_to_pool_error: Deposit to pool error. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_deposit_insufficient_fu: Insufficient funds. Make sure you are not attempting to send more than available in wallet.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_deposit_gas_error: Deposit gas error. Make you sure you have enough gas in your wallet and try again.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_invalid_sender_address: Invalid sender address. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.core_transaction_deposit_server_error: Deposit server error. Try refreshing the page or contact support.
skErrorMessages.wallet_ledger_connection_error: Ledger connection error. Make sure your Ledger is connected and unlocked and other tabs or apps using Ledger are closed.
skErrorMessages.wallet_ledger_connection_claimed: Ledger connection error. Make sure your Ledger is connected and unlocked and other tabs or apps using Ledger are closed.
skErrorMessages.wallet_ledger_get_address_error: Ledger could not get address. Make sure your Ledger is connected and unlocked and other tabs or apps using Ledger are closed.
skErrorMessages.wallet_ledger_device_not_found: Ledger device not found. Make sure your Ledger is connected and unlocked and other tabs or apps using Ledger are closed.
skErrorMessages.helpers_number_different_decimals: Number has different decimals than expected. Please reload the page and contact support if this error persists.

common.customRecipientTooltip: Receive asset to your custom address.
common.expertModeTooltip: You are able to pool RUNE + Asset with the dynamic ratio in Expert Mode.
common.slippageTooltip: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
common.slippageTooltipChainflip: Your swap is secured by Chainflip with a 5% slippage protection. Transactions exceeding this limit will automatically be reverted to ensure accurate execution.
common.supportInfo: If you have any questions regarding THORSwap or suggestions you would like to share with us, feel free to contact us via our Discord.
common.thorswapDescription: THORSwap is world's first multi-chain dex powered by THORChain
common.txFeeTooltip: Accelerating a transaction by using a higher gas price increases its chances of getting processed by the network faster.

announcements.chainHalted: %{chain} Chain is temporarily halted on THORChain. All trading and LP actions are currently unavailable
announcements.chainLPHalted: Adding and withdrawing from LP/Earn on %{chain} Chain is temporarily unavailable.
announcements.chainTradeHalted: Trading on %{chain} Chain is temporarily unavailable.
announcements.outboundQueue: THORChain is currently experiencing heavy outbound queue (%{outboundQueue}). Swaps could take longer than usual to process.
announcements.thorChainHalted: THORChain is temporarily unavailable while undergoing maintenance.
announcements.tradingGloballyDisabled: THORChain is currently experiencing technical difficulties. Team is investigating.

assetSelect.ledgerLiveSwitchNotSupported: Output Asset is not supported as Input on Ledger Live

sidebar.supportInfo: For technical support, please contact us via our official Discord Server (beware of anyone claiming to be THORSwap support - we will never DM you outside of our Support Desk on Discord).

pendingLiquidity.content: Pending Deposit Transactions must be completed by adding %{asset} symmetrically.
pendingLiquidity.pendingInfoGeneral: Pending Deposit Transactions must be completed by adding missing asset symmetrically
pendingLiquidity.pendingInfoTitle: You have Pending Deposit Transaction for pool.
pendingLiquidity.withdrawWarning: Withdraw LP or pending LP will result the withdrawal of your existing LP position in the same pool. Please choose to complete if you don't want to withdraw your existing LP.

txManager.confirmRemovePending: Are you sure you want to remove pending transaction from the history?
txManager.couldNotLoadTx: Transaction is no longer tracked by our services.

addLiquidity.asymmetricPoolNotice: Your assets will be Rebalanced upon entering the pool. This means you will have 50:50 exposure to both RUNE and your ASSET.
addLiquidity.asymmetricPoolNotice0: Your %{depositAsset} will be rebalanced upon entering the pool. This means you will have 50:50 exposure to both RUNE and %{asset}.
addLiquidity.asymmetricPoolTip: You are about to deposit to a pool asymmetrically.
addLiquidity.lpProgressModalDescription:
You are about to add liquidity to a pool.
This process may involve two transactions. You can change your wallet in middle of the process. Please make sure you have enough balance to cover the transaction fee.
This process may take from few minutes to few hours depending on the network congestion.
addLiquidity.openLedgerWallet: %{wallet} detected, please make sure to open the %{chain} app before clicking on 'Add %{asset}'
addLiquidity.title: Provide liquidity to THORChain

runePool.warningTitle: RUNEPool is a new and experimental feature.
runePool.warningContent: RUNEPool deposits have a minimum lock up period of 90 days. Please be aware that you might lose RUNE to impermanent loss

liquidity.hardCapReachedTooltip: Deposits are temporarily disabled because capacity has been reached.
liquidity.noLiquidityToWithdraw: You don't have LP to withdraw
liquidity.poolShareTooltip: Estimated percentage of your pool share after providing the liquidity
liquidity.tip: Liquidity providers earn a 0.25% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.

multisig.addMembersDescription: Add members (e.g wallets of your teammates)
multisig.addMembersToWallet: Add members to your new THORSafe. You will need their THORChain addresses or public keys - yours has been prefilled. NOTE: the order of members matters, changing the order will result in a new THORSafe address. This does not affect signing order.
multisig.addYourSignatureInfo: Connect your THORChain Wallet (currently Keystore only) to sign this transaction. Please make sure you are also connected to the correct THORSafe for this transaction.
multisig.broadcastTxInfo: You have all required signatures and transaction can be broadcasted.
multisig.broadcastTxInfoBlocked: You do not have all required signatures to broadcast this transaction. Pass on the transaction JSON file one at a time until all required members have completed signing.
multisig.confirmWalletRemoval: Please confirm you want to disconnect this wallet.
multisig.connectThorchainCurrentlyKeystore: Connect your THORChain wallet (currently Keystore only):
multisig.connectThorchainWallet: Connect your THORChain wallet (currently Keystore only) to retrieve your Public Key.
multisig.createMultisigDescription: Create a new THORSafe multi-sig wallet that is managed by two or more members. You will be required to pay a network fee and initial $RUNE deposit to generate your new THORSafe.
multisig.createMultisigPubKeyInfo: You will need your THORChain wallet’s Address or Public Key in order to create a new THORSafe.
multisig.createMultisigStart: Once you have Public Keys of all members you are ready to create a new THORSafe.
multisig.createTxDisabledInfo: You need connected multisig wallet to create new transaction
multisig.createdWalletAddress: Your THORSafe has been created. You can view its address below:
multisig.depositSymWarning: THORSafe can deposit only RUNE side. You need to deposit asset side in a separate transaction.
multisig.enterMultisigWalletName: Enter a name of the multi-sig wallet
multisig.existingMultisigDescription: Already have a THORChain multi-sig wallet? Easily access it by entering your THORChain (RUNE) Address. Only members of the multi-sig wallet will be able to sign transactions.
multisig.exportError: Failed to export your wallet to a file
multisig.exportTooltip: Export wallet info to a file
multisig.exportTxInfo: Export transaction data along with current signatures as a JSON file and pass it on to the next signer before broadcasting.
multisig.exportTxWithSignaturesTooltip: You must do this one at a time, passing the JSON file to the next member after you have signed.
multisig.exportWalletInfoToFile: Export THORSafe JSON file to share with fellow members and connect for future use
multisig.importMultisigDescription: Access an existing THORSafe by importing the wallet JSON file.
multisig.importMultisigSecondDescription: It is safe to share this file with your fellow THORSafe members.
multisig.importSignatureInfo: If you have signature from other member you can import it below.
multisig.importTransactionDescription: Import, sign and/ or broadcast an existing transaction.
multisig.incorrectSignatures: At least one of signatures is invalid.
multisig.incorrectTxCreateConfig: Incorrect txCreate config or missing txCreate context provider
multisig.membersTooltip: Your THORSafe should have two or more members, add more by importing their Wallet Private Key.
multisig.name: Name
multisig.nameYourMultisigWallet: Let's give your new multi-sig wallet an address. This name is stored locally and will never be shared by THORSwap or any third parties.
multisig.nameYourWalletOptionaly: (Optional) Name your new THORSafe. This name is for personal records and stored locally - it is not shared with THORSwap or any third parties.
multisig.newTransactionDescription: Once a transaction is created, it can be signed by members of the THORSafe, and then broadcast.
multisig.notActiveAccount: Your THORSafe is not yet active, make an initial $RUNE deposit to complete setup.
multisig.pasteSignature: Please, paste your signature generated by your CLI here.
multisig.pasteSignatureInfo: Please, paste your signature generated by your CLI. Click 'Submit Signature' to submit signature.
multisig.publicKeyBase64: Member Name Wallet Address or Public Key (base 64)
multisig.publicKeyInfo: You will need Public Keys for each member’s THORChain wallet in order to create a new THORSafe.
multisig.requiredMember: You need at least 2 wallet members
multisig.selectTxJsonFile: Import Transaction JSON file to continue signing process.
multisig.selectWalletJson: Select wallet json file and import info
multisig.setMultisigSigners: Set Multi-sig signers for how many people must sign transactions in order to be executed successfully.
multisig.signersTooltip: Specify how many members must sign before a transaction is executed. In general, the more signers required, the more your THORSafe is.
multisig.thorSafeInfo: You’re almost there! Review and activate your new THORSafe below
multisig.thorsafeDescription: THORSafe is a Multi-sig Wallet interface for secure management of THORChain Assets.
multisig.thorsafeFileTooltip: This is different from the THORSafe JSON file. You would have received this from other designated signees of the transaction.
multisig.thorsafeSecondDescription: Drastically improve your DeFi Security by creating and managing THORChain multi-sig wallets on THORSwap. THORSafe reduces dependency on one person or device, and can be used for enhanced self-custody, group decision making/ node operations/ liquidity pooling, escrow transactions, dead man's switch, and much more.
multisig.txSignaturesInfo: The required number of signatures must be met before the transaction can be ready for broadcast.

send.description: Send tokens to other wallets and manage your assets
send.title: Send tokens
send.txFeeTooltip: Gas fee to send the transaction, There's no extra charges from THORChain Protocol

stakingVThor.apyTip: Rates shown are estimates based on 30 day average, and may fluctuate.
stakingVThor.maximizeYield: Maximize yield by staking THOR for vTHOR
stakingVThor.stakeInfo:
When you stake $THOR (ERC-20), you'll receive $vTHOR - a composable and transferable token that represents your staking position.

Your Stake will automatically receive auto-compounding Staking Rewards consisting of (i) block reward emissions, and (ii) 75% of all THORSwap revenues.

When you unstake $THOR, you will receive Staking Rewards proportional to your unstake size.
stakingVThor.stakeInfoDescription: You have staked $THOR in v1 contract. Please unstake it and use vTHOR stake.
stakingVThor.stakeInfoTitle: You have staked $THOR in v1 contract
stakingVThor.stakeVThorSubtitle: Stake THOR to earn staking rewards and trading discounts
stakingVThor.title: vTHOR Staking
stakingVThor.totalThorTip: Total $THOR staked in the contract with % of all available $THOR staked ($THOR Staked / Circulating Supply)

stats.24VolumeTooltip: Last 24H Volume for Swap, Add, Withdraw.

stats.totalLiqTooltip: Total Liquidity Added in all pools.
stats.totalRUNETooltip: Total Pooled RUNE / Max RUNE Liquidity Cap.

stats.tvlTooltip: Total Value Locked in the network (Includes all Liquidity, Active Bond, and Standby Bond).

swap.affiliateFee: %{percent} affiliate fee is charged by THORSwap. 75% of fees are redistributed back to vTHOR stakers.
swap.chainflipBoost: Boost decreases blocktime for BTC swaps by up to 75%. Click to learn more.
swap.chainflipFee: 0.3% broker fee is charged by THORSwap. 75% of fees are redistributed back to vTHOR stakers.
swap.chainflipSlippageWarning: Chainflip typically expects to meet the expected quote amount, however the protocol uses 5% fixed price protection as a backstop.
swap.amountToApproveExplanation:
This is the amount you will approve to be spent by you via contract.
You can decide to approve more than you will swap to save on gas fees later.
It is not the amount of asset you will swap out.
swap.approveDefaultExplanation: Approve available balance of asset in your wallet
swap.approveInfiniteExplanation: Approve infinite amount of asset to be spent by you via contract
swap.approveLessThanBalance: You are approving less than your current balance. This may result in an unexpected transaction failure in future.
swap.description: Swap %{inputAsset} to %{outputAsset} in an easy and decentralized way
swap.gasHistoryNotSupported: For %{chain} chain gas history analysis is not yet supported.
swap.gasTooltip:
%{chain} gas rate: %{state}
 Click to view details
swap.networkFeeTooltip: Network fee used to pay for transactions. Click to see more details.
swap.priceOptimizationInfo: THORChain Streaming Swap automatically splits the quote into smaller sub-swaps executed over a longer period of time, delivering better rates. Completes as a single transaction. Click to learn more.
swap.priceProtectionUnavailable: Slip Protection Unavailable for this Transaction
swap.priceProtectionUnavailableDesc: Due to limitations with the Ledger %{chain} app, price protection and streaming swaps are not available for this trade. You may lose funds. If you choose to continue, THORSwap is not responsible for lost funds.
swap.routeContractApproved: Contract for this route swap has been approved.
swap.slippageConfirmationWarning: Slippage is higher than expected. Are you sure you want to continue?
swap.slippageMarketRateWarning: You selected longer swap and set slippage. This may result in partial refund.
swap.swapPath: Swap Graph explanation which pools are used to route the trade.
swap.noPriceProtectionTooltip: Swap Values below 500 USD don't offer price protection due to high likelihood of refunds.

warning.highPriceImpactTooltip: This swap has a high value impact given the current liquidity and network fees. There may be a large difference between the amount of your input token and what you will receive in the output token.

thorname.expirationNote: Given date is only estimate based, actual expiration date may differ. TNS will expire as soon as THORChain block number reaches: %{block}
thorname.inputValidThorAddress: Please input a valid THORChain address
thorname.thornameInfo: THORName: Registrations and Assignment of wallet addresses available (trading coming soon). THORNames are case-insensitive, limited to 30 characters, including a-Z, all numbers 0–9 and -_+
thorname.title: Manage your THORName

wallet.estimatedTimeTooltip: Estimated time to process the transaction
wallet.expectedOutputTooltip: Estimated output amount based on current exchange rate
wallet.minReceivedTooltip: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
wallet.networkFeeTooltip: Thorchain network fee used to pay outbound transaction
wallet.priceRate: The ratio between THOR and vTHOR. As Staking Rewards accumulate, this ratio will change over time.
wallet.slippageTooltip: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
wallet.totalFeeTooltip: Sum of both transaction fee and network fee
wallet.transactionFeeTooltip: Gas fee used for submitting the transaction

walletDrawer.confirmDisconnect: Are you sure you want to disconnect your wallet?

Settings > Default Ethereum wallet > Brave Wallet
walletModal.ledgerWalletWarning: Please make sure your Ledger is unlocked and you have opened the app you would like to connect before proceeding
walletModal.noSlipProtection_part1: I understand this trade has been flagged for major slippage and
walletModal.noSlipProtection_part2: agree to continue with no slip protection.
walletModal.noSlipProtection_part3: THORSwap shall not be held responsible for any loss of funds.
walletModal.okxWalletWarning: Please ensure that your Okx wallet is configured to the 'Native Segwit' setting for your Bitcoin address. THORChain does not support Taproot at the moment.
walletModal.walletSaveInfo: Your wallet settings will be saved in browser. We do not store anything secure, just selected configuration. It will be saved until manual disconnect
